definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: Those boys dressed themselves in Li Ning tracksuits immediately.
sentences.chinese: 那些男生都立即穿上了李宁牌运动服。

sentences.english: Xiao Wang likes the silver pink sports-wear very much.
sentences.chinese: 小王非常喜欢那件银红色的运动服。

sentences.english: The sports dress is too loose.
Love is washing his sports togs.
We are exporters of sportswear of China.
sentences.chinese: 我们是中国的运动服式经销商。

sentences.english: Save money on laundry detergent and workout clothes.
sentences.chinese: 节省了干洗剂和运动服的花费。

sentences.english: You can go to Walmart and get some good-ass tracksuits.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去沃尔玛淘到一些好到不行的运动服。

sentences.english: I am 44 years old and have 8 tracksuits the same colour and size.
sentences.chinese: 我44岁了，有八套同样颜色和尺码的运动服。

sentences.english: Some of the teachers were even wearing tracksuit bottoms!
sentences.chinese: 部分老师甚至只是穿了套运动服。

sentences.english: The reality is that wearing apparel can be overcome with sweat in the gym running.
sentences.chinese: 可现实却是穿着运动服浑身是汗地在跑体育馆里。

sentences.english: Aimei bumps into Youqing on her shopping trip.
sentences.chinese: 爱美去买爬山运动服，遇到有情。

sentences.english: Introducing a new style of waterproof, breathable activewear.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了防水，透气运动服的新风格。

sentences.english: You'll want to buy new athletic clothes and loungewear.
sentences.chinese: 你想买新的运动服和居家服。

sentences.english: He wore his swimsuit underneath his slacks.
sentences.chinese: 他在运动服里面衬着游泳衣。

sentences.english: Posters advertising the Roots x Douglas Coupland sportswear collection.
sentences.chinese: 海报广告的根x道格拉斯库普兰运动服集合。
